<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows"></a>

# EditorExportPlatformWindows

**Inherits:** [EditorExportPlatformPC](EditorExportPlatformPC.md) **\<** [EditorExportPlatform](EditorExportPlatform.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Exporter for Windows.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The Windows exporter customizes how a Windows build is handled. In the editor's "Export" window, it is created when adding a new "Windows" preset.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Exporting for Windows](../tutorials/export/exporting_for_windows.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/company_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/company_name** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/company_name)

Company that produced the application. Required. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/console_wrapper_icon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/console_wrapper_icon** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/console_wrapper_icon)

Console wrapper icon file. If left empty, it will fallback to [application/icon](EditorExportPlatformWindows.md#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/icon), then to [ProjectSettings.application/config/windows_native_icon](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/windows_native_icon), and lastly, [ProjectSettings.application/config/icon](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/icon).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/copyright"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/copyright** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/copyright)

Copyright notice for the bundle visible to the user. Optional. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/d3d12_agility_sdk_multiarch"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **application/d3d12_agility_sdk_multiarch** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/d3d12_agility_sdk_multiarch)

If ``true``, and [application/export_d3d12](EditorExportPlatformWindows.md#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/export_d3d12) is set, the Agility SDK DLLs will be stored in arch-specific subdirectories.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/export_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **application/export_angle** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/export_angle)

If set to ``1``, ANGLE libraries are exported with the exported application. If set to ``0``, ANGLE libraries are exported only if [ProjectSettings.rendering/gl_compatibility/driver](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_rendering/gl_compatibility/driver) is set to ``"opengl3_angle"``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/export_d3d12"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **application/export_d3d12** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/export_d3d12)

If set to ``1``, the Direct3D 12 runtime libraries (Agility SDK, PIX) are exported with the exported application. If set to ``0``, Direct3D 12 libraries are exported only if [ProjectSettings.rendering/rendering_device/driver](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_rendering/rendering_device/driver) is set to ``"d3d12"``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/file_description"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/file_description** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/file_description)

File description to be presented to users. Required. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/file_version"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/file_version** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/file_version)

Version number of the file. Falls back to [ProjectSettings.application/config/version](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/version) if left empty. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/icon"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/icon** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/icon)

Application icon file. If left empty, it will fallback to [ProjectSettings.application/config/windows_native_icon](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/windows_native_icon), and then to [ProjectSettings.application/config/icon](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/icon).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/icon_interpolation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **application/icon_interpolation** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/icon_interpolation)

Interpolation method used to resize application icon.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/modify_resources"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **application/modify_resources** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/modify_resources)

If enabled, icon and metadata of the exported executable is set according to the other ``application/*`` values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/product_name"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/product_name** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/product_name)

Name of the application. Required. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/product_version"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/product_version** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/product_version)

Application version visible to the user. Falls back to [ProjectSettings.application/config/version](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_application/config/version) if left empty. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/trademarks"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **application/trademarks** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_application/trademarks)

Trademarks and registered trademarks that apply to the file. Optional. See [StringFileInfo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/menurc/stringfileinfo-block).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_binary_format/architecture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **binary_format/architecture** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_binary_format/architecture)

Application executable architecture.

Supported architectures: ``x86_32``, ``x86_64``, and ``arm64``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_binary_format/embed_pck"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **binary_format/embed_pck** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_binary_format/embed_pck)

If ``true``, project resources are embedded into the executable.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/custom_options"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **codesign/custom_options** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/custom_options)

Array of the additional command line arguments passed to the code signing tool. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/description"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **codesign/description** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/description)

Description of the signed content. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/digest_algorithm"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **codesign/digest_algorithm** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/digest_algorithm)

Digest algorithm to use for creating signature. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/enable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **codesign/enable** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/enable)

If ``true``, executable signing is enabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/identity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **codesign/identity** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/identity)

PKCS #12 certificate file used to sign executable or certificate SHA-1 hash (if [codesign/identity_type](EditorExportPlatformWindows.md#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/identity_type) is set to "Use certificate store"). See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

Can be overridden with the environment variable ``GODOT_WINDOWS_CODESIGN_IDENTITY``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/identity_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **codesign/identity_type** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/identity_type)

Type of identity to use. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

Can be overridden with the environment variable ``GODOT_WINDOWS_CODESIGN_IDENTITY_TYPE``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/password"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **codesign/password** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/password)

Password for the certificate file used to sign executable. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

Can be overridden with the environment variable ``GODOT_WINDOWS_CODESIGN_PASSWORD``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/timestamp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **codesign/timestamp** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/timestamp)

If ``true``, time-stamp is added to the signature. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/timestamp_server_url"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **codesign/timestamp_server_url** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_codesign/timestamp_server_url)

URL of the time stamp server. If left empty, the default server is used. See [Sign Tool](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/tools/signtool-exe).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_custom_template/debug"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **custom_template/debug** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_custom_template/debug)

Path to the custom export template. If left empty, default template is used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_custom_template/release"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **custom_template/release** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_custom_template/release)

Path to the custom export template. If left empty, default template is used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_debug/export_console_wrapper"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **debug/export_console_wrapper** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_debug/export_console_wrapper)

If ``true``, a console wrapper executable is exported alongside the main executable, which allows running the project with enabled console output.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_shader_baker/enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **shader_baker/enabled** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_shader_baker/enabled)

If ``true``, shaders will be compiled and embedded in the application. This option is only supported when using the Forward+ and Mobile renderers.

\ **Note:** When exporting as a dedicated server, the shader baker is always disabled since no rendering is performed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/cleanup_script"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/cleanup_script** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/cleanup_script)

Script code to execute on the remote host when app is finished.

The following variables can be used in the script:

- ``{temp_dir}`` - Path of temporary folder on the remote, used to upload app and scripts to.

- ``{archive_name}`` - Name of the ZIP containing uploaded application.

- ``{exe_name}`` - Name of application executable.

- ``{cmd_args}`` - Array of the command line argument for the application.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/enabled** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/enabled)

Enables remote deploy using SSH/SCP.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_scp"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_scp** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_scp)

Array of the additional command line arguments passed to the SCP.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_ssh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_ssh** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/extra_args_ssh)

Array of the additional command line arguments passed to the SSH.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/host"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/host** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/host)

Remote host SSH user name and address, in ``user@address`` format.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/port"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/port** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/port)

Remote host SSH port number.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/run_script"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **ssh_remote_deploy/run_script** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_ssh_remote_deploy/run_script)

Script code to execute on the remote host when running the app.

The following variables can be used in the script:

- ``{temp_dir}`` - Path of temporary folder on the remote, used to upload app and scripts to.

- ``{archive_name}`` - Name of the ZIP containing uploaded application.

- ``{exe_name}`` - Name of application executable.

- ``{cmd_args}`` - Array of the command line argument for the application.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_texture_format/etc2_astc"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **texture_format/etc2_astc** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_texture_format/etc2_astc)

If ``true``, project textures are exported in the ETC2/ASTC format.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_texture_format/s3tc_bptc"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **texture_format/s3tc_bptc** [ðŸ”—](#EditorExportPlatformWindows_property_texture_format/s3tc_bptc)

If ``true``, project textures are exported in the S3TC/BPTC format.
